title: Bug 16576ACC: Checkboxes in lists are not real checkboxes
description: Options in the list look like checkboxes but the aren't real checkboxes. MSInspect identfies the Role as 'list item' instead of checkbox.The Filters List page contains a Table component, and one of thecolumns cell editor is a CheckboxCellEditor;(this is similar with the Task List view, where the 'completed'column cell editor is a CheckboxCellEditor)With the current CheckboxCellEditor implementationthere's no way to add a real checkbox component into thetable; you have to specify two icons to be used bythe enable/disable state
